author: Graeme Campbell
title: Gigi Hadid Photographs Boyfriend Zayn Malik for Versus Versace‚Äôs SS17 Campaign
text:
Visit the original post to see all 4 images from this gallery. 
Multi-hyphenate supermodel and longtime Donatella Versace muse Gigi Hadid has got behind the lens for a campaign shoot with boyfriend Zayn Malik.
Hadid was enlisted to capture Versace sub-label Versus Versace‚Äôs upcoming SS17 campaign. The images were taken at LA‚Äôs famous Chateau Marmot hotel, with Hadid shooting exclusively on an iPhone and digital cameras. Fellow Brit model Adwoa Aboah also appears in the gallery.
My man by me for @versus_versace SS17 !! thank you so much @donatella_versace @patti_wilson @joannasimkin @eriktorstensson üñ§ #versusuncesored 
A post shared by Gigi Hadid (@gigihadid) on Mar 8, 2017 at 8:22am PST 

‚ÄúIt was sick to work with Versus. Dontella is a G,‚Äù said Malik. ‚ÄúIt was extra special that Gigi shot the campaign.‚Äù
The collection will drop in June, followed by the former One Directioner‚Äôs own Versus line shortly after.
Hadid recently starred in Reebok‚Äôs #neverperfect campaign. See what she had to say about it here.
